Room.Name: Desolate Corridor
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the corner of a desolate corridor under the massive glacier.
Room.LongDescription: The quiet corridor looks like it hasn't been walked through for ages. The thick dust has been collecting for what appears to be centuries. The hallway continues to the north and the west. You can hear some activity brewing to the north, but you can't really see much, though.
